word_mean: 踝：下肢的一部分，在踝关节区，足部紧上方
踝关节：足与小腿之间的关节。同articulatio talocruralis

sentence.Network_en: He had wrenched his ankle badly from the force of the fall.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因摔倒而严重扭伤了脚踝。

sentence.Network_en: His teeth clicked as he snapped at my ankle.
sentence.Network_cn: 它猛地朝我的脚脖子咬下去，牙齿还咔咔直响。

sentence.Network_en: Her ankle caught on a root, and she almost lost her balance.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的脚踝被树根绊了一下，差点摔倒。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  ancleow, of Germanic origin; superseded in Middle English  by forms from Old Norse; related to Dutch enkel and German Enkel, from an Indo-European root shared by angle

entry.def: Your ankle is the joint where your foot joins your leg.

example.tran: 约翰的脚脖子崴得很严重。

means.word_mean: 1. a gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus
